name: LCCRSF Walk-in Clinic
description: Our Walk-In Legal Clinic offers free limited legal advice and referrals to low-income community members in need. Since the 1980s, we’ve been committed to offering accessible legal support to San Francisco residents, ensuring that financial barriers never prevent individuals from receiving the help they deserve. We are relaunching our clinic in two new neighborhoods – the Mission and the Panhandle. Ensuring that anyone who walks through the door is provided with a supportive and welcoming environ

howToGetIt: Due to high demand, appointments are given on a first-come, first-served basis (space is limited). Sign-ups start at 3:30pm. Once you sign in, you’ll be assigned an appointment slot and are free to leave and return at your designated time. Please note clinics do not run on federal holidays. Join us at one of our two locations: 1st Mondays of the Month Mission, San Francisco 4:00 PM – 8:00 PM Pacific Time 3rd Mondays of the Month Panhandle, San Francisco 4:00 PM – 8:00 PM Pacific Time
address: 131 Steuart Street, Suite 400, San Francisco, CA, 94105
